ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15.25 ounce) can sliced pineapple, drained with juice reserved

cookingTips: Reserve the pineapple juice to mix into the glaze for extra flavor and shine
Apply glaze during the last 30 minutes of ham baking to prevent excessive browning
Use a pastry brush to coat evenly, reapplying layers for a glossy finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I prevent the glaze from burning while still getting a caramelized appearance?
